name: abl-connect
title: ABL - connect
description: connect abl projects to 3rd party api

scripts.pull: git checkout master && git pull origin master
scripts.push: git push origin master --tags && exit 0 && npm publish
scripts.release: release () { npm run pull && if [ -z $1 ]; then npm version patch; else npm version $1; fi && npm run push; }; release
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:=test} ABL_DEBUG=${ABL_DEBUG:=true} env $(cat .env | xargs) babel-node node_modules/.bin/_mocha
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:=test} env $(cat .env | xargs) babel-node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover --report text --report html node_modules/.bin/_mocha test/API/google.js
